content: your socks total time 7 minutes makes 1 cup ingredients 1 ¼ cups water 300 ml 3 whole cardamom pods 1 cinnamon stick 3 inches/ 8cm 1 tea bag or 1 heaping teaspoon of loose leaf tea 1 teaspoon sugar optional instructions 1 heat the water cardamom pods and cinnamon stick in a small pan over medium heat bring to a boil then simmer gently for 2-3 minutes 2 bring the water back to a boil then add the teabag or loose tea remove immediately from heat and let the tea steep for 4 minutes or to desired strength 3 strain tea stir in sugar to taste pour into your favorite mug and enjoy 4 © goose creek knits 2021
